description: Makes it possible to communicate with other apps on Android devices.  Opens another app and passes data to the app, then waits for a response.

appName.description: The package name of the external app to open and pass data to.  i.e. com.creare.skhr.tabsint for TabSINT.

dataOut.description: data object to pass to external app

message.description: A string message to pass to external app - this could be something telling the external app what to do.

data.description: Open ended field to pass other data to the external app, such as a number.
